data.text: @SenEricSchmitt FUND ICE NO RESTRICTIONS-if u Concede to the dems demands regarding ICE, Dont bother to pass SAVE,It Wont Be Enforced If ICE not at polls&dont bother Funding ICE because Repubs just Abolished ICE,stopped all arrests & deportations FOR Dems-please dont betray Citizens Again

@SenEricSchmitt The crimes are now  being committed by government goons.

You need to come to some of the protests Missourians are attending in great numbers. You may not know your constituents as well as you think.

@SenEricSchmitt Quit it. The FBI’s own numbers show crime has been trending down for decades. The only “crime wave” is the one you keep ignoring — the adjudicated rape, the tax fraud conviction, the 34 felony counts, and the insurrection. Maybe start there before lecturing anyone about crime. https://t.co/slBWW08psZ
